giya wisipas wasara pura nida siti mema deshapalana rip wan winkallata [hitiadiye nindata wati awurudu 20ka ta pasuwa aharunu miniseku pilibandawa liyana lada kathawak -- pariwarthaka] iraka aaka්ramana deka pilibandawa ho 1990 bolkan yuddha pilibandawa ho aprikawa thula adhirajyawadaya wisin diyath karana lada wiwidha le halim saha pasugiya wasara 16 pura “tha්rasthawadayata erehi yuddhaye” pa්rathipalayak lesa mada peradiga saha madhyama aasiyawe boho pa්radesha pura muda hara athi podu sanharayan pilibandawa ho hankawisiyakwath natha.

1968 wasare di silon studiyos aayathanaya aacharya lestar jems piris wenuwen mul warata nishpadanaya karana ladde golu hadawatha chithrapatayayi.prema wruthanthayak wuwa da eyata githa athulath nowina.chithrapataya wanijamaya washayen asarthaka wanu athayi bohodenage mathaya wiya.silon studiyo aayathanayata wishala paduwak gena denu athayi athamhu kata kada adahas pala kalaha.eheth ema wishishta chithrapataya silon studiyo aayathanaye ihalama aadayama ipayu chithrapataya lesa warthawak thabuweya.epamanak nowa aacharya lestar siya aawarjana we sandahan karana paridden ohu wenuwen chithrapata thrithwayakma nipadawannata silon thiyatars waga bala gaththeya.lankika sinamawe athi wishishtathama sinamakruthiya lesa salakena nidhanaya bihiwanuye emagini.
